name: Pixel Doge
description: Pixel Doge supports the play-to-earn ecosystem. Players will earn some game tokens in different levels of missions. Players can also earn BNB or BUSD by exchanging game tokens through Pancakeswap. The more players there are, the easier it is to push up the token price. The Pixel Doge NFT Collection will be released and auctioned on the Binance NFT Marketplace, where gamers can participate in the auction. The stronger the weapons and armor, the easier it is to earn game tokens. In addition, NFT owners will receive a portion of game reward tokens.
